personal_info.about: I am a software engineer with 2 years of experience in Java and Python. I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from XYZ University and a Master's degree in Computer Science from ABC University. I have worked at Google as a Software Engineer and interned at Facebook as a Software Engineer Intern. I have experience working on the search team at Google and the ads team at Facebook. I have expertise in Java and intermediate skills in Python and JavaScript. I have worked on projects using Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, Python, Django, and PostgreSQL. I have certifications in Java and Python. I am a native English speaker and have intermediate proficiency in Spanish. In my free time, I enjoy reading, traveling, and cooking.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.about: Google is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.about: Facebook is an American online social media and social networking service company based in Menlo Park, California. It was founded by Mark Zuckerberg, along with fellow Harvard College students and roommates Eduardo Saverin, Andrew McCollum, Dustin Moskovitz, and Chris Hughes.

education.name: XYZ University
education.about: XYZ University is a public research university located in City, State. It is a member of the Association of American Universities and offers over 200 undergraduate and graduate degree programs.

education.name: ABC University
education.about: ABC University is a private research university located in City, State. It is known for its strong programs in computer science, engineering, and business.

projects.name: Project 1
projects.description: This is a project description for Project 1 which is a web application built using Java and Spring Boot.
